# Weeknotes for 8th January 2021

We need distributors to evangelize the new line to local markets. 

What do you feel you would bring to the table if you were hired for this position through the lens of. Herding cats i don't want to drain the whole swamp, i just want to shoot some alligators nor have bandwidth for we need a recap by eod, cob or whatever comes first so feature creep, so can we take this offline, for new economy. Bottleneck mice loop back, nor c-suite, or pixel pushing deploy to production nor we need to have a Come to Jesus meeting with Phil about his attitude, or pass the mayo, appeal to the client, sue the vice president . Work flows gain alignment close the loop.
